game.GoalGetters:
§l§nGoal Getters§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7Balls of different sizes will be flung at you.   
Make sure you kick/punch the ball into the goal.   
The player with the most goals wins!
game.DiceyDescent:
§l§nDicey Descent§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7Choose a side to fall through   
One side will be bad   
Make sure to choose the least bad sides to win!
game.ZombieTag:
§l§nZombie Tag§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7Avoid the zombies touching you   
If a zombie attacks you, you will turn into a zombie too   
Last player standing wins
game.ZombieTag.LoreHead: You don't wanna know what's underneath
game.BarrelDaredevil:
§l§nBarrel Daredevil§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7Wait for the barrels to start falling   
Press the barrel as late as you can to win   
If you don't press the button in time you will automatically lose!
deathMessages.DiceyDescent2: %s was too good of a conducter!
deathMessages.DiceyDescent3: %s was §oshocked§r §7at how good this map is...
deathMessages.DiceyDescent6: %s should not try enter the lottery...
deathMessages.BarrelDaredevil6: %s lived life too far on the edge
deathMessages.BarrelDaredevil8: %s would suck at find the button
